createDialog.title: Add file or folder
createDialog.description: Add a file or folder to backup.

exceedingAlert.title: Not enough cloud storage
exceedingAlert.description: This folder likely can’t be backed up because it would exceed your available CloudBlink storage. To back it up, you’ll need to upgrade your CloudBlink plan.

alert.title: Cleanup happens over time
alert.description: Storage space won’t be freed instantly. BlinkDisk cleans up unused data later to ensure reliability.
